title: MyTimeline App
paragraph: The all-in-one calendar, remider, notes, photo-journal and anything that you keep to yourself. An android app developed for our college thesis, one of finalists that were able to compete for Intercollegiate IT Event.
note: Source codes were kept in campus library

cards.title: Challenge: 1st batch to do Android Apps Thesis in PLP
cards.paragraph: My team was mostly specialized in Web development and Infra, but as we did our pre-case study we know we'd ended up working for an Android application. As i remembered, we're only 4 teams in whole Senior batch that was able to developed an Android app for thesis.
cards.footnote: My group's name: Team Rocket, because you know I'm Jessie James! :P

cards.title: Risk: Technologies that never taught by the school
cards.paragraph: Here's the catch of developing something ambitious, the chaos of workflow and the unknown technologies that we might encounter, and we cannot rely with school library and even professors because Mobile Development wasn't part of our curricullum that time. But Google is always there to help you, as well as my team's dedication to this project even we're eating Pancit Canton everynight staright!

cards.title: Finalist for Intercollegiate IT competition
cards.paragraph: The part that my team was one of first batch that was able to do an Android app was already an achievement, but choosing us as one of the finalists to compete for Intercollegiate IT event in University of Makati. Thought we didn't won, but another group from my school and good friends of ours got the Champion trophy!
